meanings.definition: A Mexican dish made of masa (a dough made from corn) filled with meat, cheese, or other ingredients, wrapped in corn husks and steamed.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating the delicious tamals at the Mexican restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best tamals for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The tamals were so hot, they made me dance like a silly chicken.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the tamals filled the kitchen, making it feel like a cozy home.
meanings.sent5: The tamals were like little gifts wrapped in corn husks, waiting to be unwrapped and enjoyed.
